Simply put, this album is beautiful. From start to finish, the songs flow from one to another in an effortless manner that speaks volumes to the maturity of this band. Having had the opportunity to see them live, I can confirm that the record captures the energy and intimacy of their live shows magnificently. It goes beyond that, however. The clean, organized mixes show off intricacies in their arrangements that are often lost in the hubbub of a live show.
